## Feed Addition

---

### Checklist

Before submitting, please confirm:

- [ ] Feed URL is accessible and returns valid RSS/Atom XML
- [ ] Feed is not a duplicate of existing feed
- [ ] Feed is regularly updated (at least weekly)
- [ ] Content is appropriate (no spam, NSFW, or paywalled content)
- [ ] All required fields are filled (id, name, url, domain, description, contributor, added_at)
- [ ] ID is unique and follows format (alphanumeric + dash/underscore)
- [ ] Domain matches URL
- [ ] Description is concise (1-2 sentences)
- [ ] Feed fits chosen category
- [ ] For regional: feed is region-specific
- [ ] For global: feed is internationally relevant
